articles.title: Trump predicts China trade deal finalized in days as his Asia tour continues in Japan - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump told reporters as he flew into Japan that he expects to have a trade agreement with China finalized by the end of his tour of Asia.
articles.content:
President Trump arrived Monday in Japan, where new Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is banking on building a friendly personal relationship with the U.S. leader to ease trade tensions.
